CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 26, 1958, pg. A2, reads: " The Right Photo shows Edward Young, program director, Station KDKA, accepting the award from Louis Mason Jr., Chairman of the membership campaign, while Mrs. Rosa Parks smiles approvingly. Mrs. Parks, heroine of the Montgomery bus protests, was the principal speaker".
TitMainTitle: Louis Mason Jr. of NAACP presenting plaque to KDKA program director Edward Young, with Rosa Parks standing between them
CatSubject_tab: Hats--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
